title: That dreaded phone call
creator_credit: Ruth Burleigh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Ruth Burleigh reflects on the day she’ll have to make that dreaded call and put her beloved horse Boris ‘out to pasture’. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
creator_credit_for_label: Ruth Burleigh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
